class.name: UtilityAIBTRepeatUntil
class.brief_description: Ticks its child either until the [member expected_tick_result] is returned by its child for [member max_repeat_times] number of times.
class.description: The RepeatUntil node ticks its child either until the [member expected_tick_result] is returned by its child for [member max_repeat_times] number of times. If [member max_repeat_times] is set to [code]-1[/code], only the [member expected_tick_result] will end the loop.

members.member: The result that the child node should return to end the loop. Can be either [code]-1[/code]=Failure, [code]0[/code]=Running or [code]1[/code]=Success.
The maximum times the limiter node can be ticked.
